SELECT p.*, i.user_name, f.flux, u.expense, u.expense_time, u.expire_time, m.meet_name FROM t_csp_user_flux_purchase p LEFT JOIN t_csp_user_info i ON p.user_id = i.id LEFT JOIN t_csp_user_flux f ON p.user_id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN t_csp_user_flux_usage u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_meet m ON u.meeting_id = m.id WHERE 1=1
AND p.id=#{id}
